From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin trānsportāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [tɾəns.purˈta]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [tɾəns.porˈta]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [tɾans.poɾˈtaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

transportar (first-person singular present transporto, first-person singular preterite transportí, past participle transportat); root stress: (Central, Valencia, Balearic) /ɔ/

  1. to transport

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of transportar (first conjugation)
infinitive transportar
gerund transportant
past participle masculine feminine
singular transportat transportada
plural transportats transportades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present transporto transportes transporta transportem transporteu transporten
imperfect transportava transportaves transportava transportàvem transportàveu transportaven
future transportaré transportaràs transportarà transportarem transportareu transportaran
preterite transportí transportares transportà transportàrem transportàreu transportaren
conditional transportaria transportaries transportaria transportaríem transportaríeu transportarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present transporti transportis transporti transportem transporteu transportin
imperfect transportés transportessis transportés transportéssim transportéssiu transportessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — transporta transporti transportem transporteu transportin
negative (no) — no transportis no transporti no transportem no transporteu no transportin

Derived terms

[edit]
  • transport

Further reading

[edit]
  • “transportar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “transportar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “transportar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “transportar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin trānsportāre.

Verb

[edit]

transportar (first-person singular present transporto, first-person singular preterite transportei, past participle transportado)

  1. to transport

[edit]

Norwegian Nynorsk

[edit]

Noun

[edit]

transportar m

  1. indefinite plural of transport

Occitan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin trānsportāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)

Verb

[edit]

transportar

  1. to transport

Conjugation

[edit]

This verb needs an inflection-table template.

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin trānsportāre (“to transport”), from trāns- (“across”) + portō (“to carry”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /tɾɐ̃s.poʁˈta(ʁ)/ [tɾɐ̃s.pohˈta(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /tɾɐ̃s.poʁˈta(ʁ)/ [tɾɐ̃s.pohˈta(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /tɾɐ̃s.poɾˈta(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /tɾɐ̃ʃ.poʁˈta(ʁ)/ [tɾɐ̃ʃ.poχˈta(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /tɾɐ̃s.poɻˈta(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /tɾɐ̃ʃ.puɾˈtaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /tɾɐ̃ʃ.puɾˈtaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /tɾɐ̃ʃ.puɾˈta.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: trans‧por‧tar

Verb

[edit]

transportar (first-person singular present transporto, first-person singular preterite transportei, past participle transportado)

  1. to transport, carry

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of transportar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)

Impersonal transportar
Personal transportar transportares transportar transportarmos transportardes transportarem
Gerund
transportando
Past participle
Masculine transportado transportados
Feminine transportada transportadas
Indicative
Present transporto transportas transporta transportamos transportais transportam
Imperfect transportava transportavas transportava transportávamos transportáveis transportavam
Preterite transportei transportaste transportou transportamos1, transportámos2 transportastes transportaram
Pluperfect transportara transportaras transportara transportáramos transportáreis transportaram
Future transportarei transportarás transportará transportaremos transportareis transportarão
Conditional transportaria transportarias transportaria transportaríamos transportaríeis transportariam

Imperfect transportasse transportasses transportasse transportássemos transportásseis transportassem

Imperative
Affirmative transporta transporte transportemos transportai transportem
Negative (não) não transportes não transporte não transportemos não transporteis não transportem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Derived terms

[edit]
  • transporte

Further reading

[edit]
  • “transportar”, in Dicionário Priberam da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Lisbon: Priberam, 2008–2025

Spanish

[edit]

Alternative forms

[edit]
  • trasportar

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin trānsportāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /tɾanspoɾˈtaɾ/ [t̪ɾãns.poɾˈt̪aɾ], /tɾaspoɾˈtaɾ/ [t̪ɾas.poɾˈt̪aɾ]
  • Audio (Colombia):(file)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: trans‧por‧tar

Verb

[edit]

transportar (first-person singular present transporto, first-person singular preterite transporté, past participle transportado)

  1. to transport
  2. (music) to transpose

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of transportar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive transportar
gerund transportando
past participle masculine feminine
singular transportado transportada
plural transportados transportadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present transporto transportastú
transportásvos 		transporta transportamos transportáis transportan
imperfect transportaba transportabas transportaba transportábamos transportabais transportaban
preterite transporté transportaste transportó transportamos transportasteis transportaron
future transportaré transportarás transportará transportaremos transportaréis transportarán
conditional transportaría transportarías transportaría transportaríamos transportaríais transportarían
subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros

vosotras 		ellos/ellas

transportésvos2 		transporte transportemos transportéis transporten

future1 transportare transportares transportare transportáremos transportareis transportaren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative transportatú
transportávos 		transporte transportemos transportad transporten
negative no transportes no transporte no transportemos no transportéis no transporten

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
